Morris County, also regarded as the Skylands Region, is household to numerous historical destinations.

Much more than 200 a long time prior to the American Revolution, New Jersey's shoreline was explored by Giovanni da Verrazano. Henry Hudson came 85 a long time afterwards, sailing into Newark Bay and paving the way for the region's initially settlement set up in 1620 by the Dutch. New Jersey, which is residence to Ellis Island and the Statue of Liberty, has been instrumental in this Nation's birth and development.
